description.name: linkoptimism
description.tagline: ChainLink Token optimism Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto optimism-link Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept ChainLink Token optimism directly on your website
Unique optimism/link receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your optimism/link wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
